dict.acceptation: 栅栏，篱笆；围墙；防护物；剑术；
用篱笆围住；防护；练习剑术；
练习击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏；

sent.orig: From the perspective of kinesiology, three aspects are analyzed concerning fence-ascending, fence-over striding and fence-descending.
sent.trans: 用运动学观点，从起跨上栏、腾空过栏和下栏支撑三个方面进行分析。

sent.orig: Nail the boards onto the fence posts; they will make a good fence.
sent.trans: 把这些木板钉在围墙柱子上，这样围墙就牢固了。

sent.orig: Chain link fence section, stretch to desired length. Place multiple fence sections end-to-end.
sent.trans: 金属防护网段，可任意拉伸到所需的长度。将多个防护网段首尾相连。

sent.orig: Export wire fence fence to South Africa any restrictions?
sent.trans: 出口钢丝护栏围墙到南非有何限制吗？

sent.orig: Some who had been on the fence came out in favor of the plan.
sent.trans: 一些曾经持骑墙态度的人开始支持该计划。
